nodes.text: The Imperial Cruiser was an aquatic-based naval vessel that was developed for use in shore bombardment and the shelling of enemy fleets. It boasted a single large cannon. Some time later, an upgraded version, the Heavy Cruiser, was developed. Its upgrades included two large cannons and heavier, more reinforced armor.
Cruisers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns.
